data.text:
Program Advisor

Tabmitha Y. Jervey, PhD

Visiting Assistant Professor of Biology

College of Arts & Sciences

1000 Regent University Drive

CRB Suite 111 Room 113

tjervey@regent.edu

757.352.4140

Prerequisite Checklist

Below are the courses offered through Regent University (RU) that will be accepted toward completing the 8 prerequisites to apply to the PA program. Only 1 of the acceptable courses listed is required to meet the prerequisite. If multiple courses listed are on the transcript, the course with the highest grade will be used in our review.

Please note that 7 of 8 prerequisite courses must be completed before the EAP application deadline.

All courses must be completed at Regent University with a B- or better.

Pre-requisite courses must not be repeated for poor performance.

Note: Any exceptions must be approved in advance by the Admissions Directors and will not be granted retroactively.
